Which number is the odd one out?
explanation: in the others the sum of the first two numbers is equal to the sum of the second two numbers, for example 5 + 2 = 6 + 1

text: Which is the odd one out?
explanation: the rest are the same figure rotated

text: How many minutes is it before 12 noon, if 48 minutes ago it was twice as many minutes past 9 am?
explanation: 12 noon less 44 minutes = 11.16, 11.16 less 48 minutes = 10.28, 9 am plus 88 minutes (44 ? 2) = 10.28

text: Which is the odd one out?
explanation: it is a three-dimensional figure. The rest are all two-dimensional figures

text: Switch A turns lights 1 and 2 on/off or off/on. Switch B turns lights 2 and 4 on/off or off/on. Switch C turns lights 1 and 3 on/off or off/on. Switches C, A and B are thrown in turn with the result that Figure 1 turns into Figure 2. Which switch does not work at all? (white=ON)
Which is the missing tile?
explanation: in each line and column, each of the three rings is shaded black once

text: Which word in brackets is closest in meaning to the word in capitals? BRUNT
Which of the following is not an anagram of a type of food?
explanation: WIN BOAR = rainbow. The foods are spaghetti (PAST EIGHT), macaroni (I CAN ROAM), pancake (CAN PEAK) and chocolate (COOL CHEAT);

text: What number should replace the question mark?
explanation: looking across at the three circles, the number in the middle is the product of the two numbers in the same segment in the other two circles. Thus, 3 ? 2 = 6, 7 ? 3 = 21 and 4 ? 4 = 16;

text: How many lines appear below?
Which is the missing tile?
explanation: in each line across and down the arrows point in each of three directions left, right and down. The number of arrows increases 1, 2, 3 in each row

text: able, rot, son, king - Which word below shares a common feature with all the words above?
explanation: all words can be prefixed with PAR to form another word – parable, parrot, parson, parking, partake

text: To which hexagon below can a dot be added so that both dots then meet the same conditions as the two dots in the hexagon above?
explanation: so that one dot appears in the triangle and one circle; and the other dot appears in the triangle and three circles

text: What number should replace the question mark?
explanation: looking at lines of numbers from the top: 9 ? 8 = 72; 72 ? 8 = 576; 576 ? 8 = 4608

text: Which is the missing section?
explanation: each opposite corner block of four squares are identical
